question: X was created by a knight who was a physician by profession in the late 19th century.
Y, a character similar to X is seen performing the same acts as X and keeps getting in and out of houses without any trouble and usually with the owner’s consent.
ID X, Y and the 21 miles stretch.
X got his early education in a boys residential school. X was also responsible for the erection of the main gate walls and the other kids at the school helped X put the gate in place.
Later in life, X and his wife Y enjoyed wild safaris with nasty elephants, in the solitude of the African jungles.
Y always felt responsible for events occurring across the globe and had to stay especially cautious in all the public appearances.
The show depicts the evolution of X & Y as ordinary human beings as they are impacted by unfolding world history.
ID X, Y & the show.
questions.answer: X: Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh Y: Queen Elizabeth II, The Crown

question: A creature Z from underworld presented itself in a school classroom and stayed on X’s tail since then when X found Y.
X suddenly came in the spotlight and became infamous for controlling millions of people without being nowhere close to them.
X had to create an elaborate plan to get rid of X, involving multiple deaths, in spite of warning from Z, but of no avail as X died when Z reacquired Y.
Y is also the name of the series/movie.
ID X, Y & Z.
questions.answer: X: Light Yagami, Y: Death Note, Z: Shinigami
